column4: anyone: i'm trying to upgrade my firefox.  i followed the step-by-step instructions at the wiki site, but when i try to execute 'firefox' from the terminal or from the launcher icon, i receive an error that permission is denied.
terminal error also states that the command is not found.
i've tried uninstalling and reinstalling and i can't even get my 1.0.8 back.  can someone help me?
